data.actual_result: You should be able to edit some basic server settings such as verification level, but nothing will save because in the end you don't have manage server permission (so, this is just a visual bug). <http://i.imgur.com/vnO1ofA.png>
data.expected_result: Without manage server, you should not be able to edit server settings
data.short_description: Users with manage roles permission look like they can edit server settings (nothing saves, which is correct)
data.steps_to_repro: - Receive"manage roles" permission, and no other administrative permissions (especially without manage server)  - On iOS, view server settings  - Try to change basic server settings, such as verification level.
